EmailTemplate.description: Send the "not entitled" rejection to the Customer
EmailTemplate.name: Entitlement Rejection - Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}{!Case.Contact}{!Case.Product_Part__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Your request for quote has reached Ground Support Solutions. All quote requests are screened to determine entitlement to purchase ground support equipment. It is the policy of Honeywell to limit distribution of maintenance materials to only direct users of the supported prime equipment. We are unable to provide a quote to Companies that are not licensed by Honeywell.
If you have a Honeywell license agreement that we are unaware of, please advise and we will be happy to review.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
